√úVEG lapot haszn√°ljatok, mert ez nem tud megkarcol√≥dni a sok v√°g√°s k√∂zben, √©s reped√©sek h√≠j√°n sokkal k√∂nnyebben lej√∂n r√≥la a csillagunk is. Minden v√°g√°s ut√°n mossuk √©s t√∂r√∂lj√ºk el az √ºveglapunkat √©s a sniccert is.

About the C&P Forum
topic.body:
Welcome to the free Chemistry & Pyrotechnics Multilanguage pyrotechnic chemical forum and free marketplace. No central server and the site are run by the pyro community just like you,the people who visite the forum! Here you can ask questions about amateur and professional pyrotechnics and chemistry. You can send pyrotechnic articles to home-made products, supplies, chemicals , and what you just want. P2P-based ZeroMail tourgh TOR is a safe way to send a private message. This site is in English but does not bind to any country. To use this program, use TOR ALWAYS mode. 

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

#Forum rules!

Drug and bomb making is forbidden! You can free forums for pyrotechnics, explosives and chemistry. Enemy or community-threatening and harmful posts and comments will be deleted and removed from the site. Do not trolling use our forum cultured way.

Everyone has 195kB posts for his own data.json file. If this amount runs out of the way, you can reduce the size of deleting your old posts that are less useful to the community. The administrator will automatically increase the limit for members who are useful to the community! Those who show results and good posts on the forum, the 195kB limitation does not apply to them!

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
#Technical informations:

If you want to download files from a file or video sharing site C&P File or Video Share , use the + SEED button.Set up the ZeroNet client to run at system startup to get the files!

To download all the big files on the file or video sharing site, drag the circle icon 0 to the left. And set the DOWNLOAD ALL OPTIONAL FILE to the size you want to download a single file.Example videos and larger files 1500 MB images are enough for 2MB.If you use this option you can access all files directly without waiting time!

More Info:[HOW TO GET ALL FILES,CONTENT. SUPPORT YOUR SELF AND ALL OF US!](http://127.0.0.1:43110/13WfLQv2nWXYBNUEL3PkWwGUe3H7qkTF5Y/?Topic:1550837197_1KsFe6vgVpNFCNTQDQryrcQYySkAbFLXCV/HOW+TO+GET+ALL+FILES+CONTENT+SUPPORT+YOUR+SELF+AND+ALL+OF+US)


-To Edit Pages or Entries: You can edit or delete your Topics, Postings, or Entries with the mouse right before the entry you want to edit. Then a pencil will appear on the pencil click on it.Your comments can be edited or deleted at any time you like.

-Save the users.json file in the program's data directory! If you lose this, you will not be able to recover your account. If you want to reset your account, just copy this file to the ZeroNet data directory.

-How secure is the page?: The site in TOR ALWAYS mode completely safe. Only in this mode nobody can monitor you.

-What can I advertise on the site? That's why I have to pay for it.: You can freely publish anything on the site and sell it to any pyrotechnics or chemistry products frealy!
-How can I change my identity ?: Save the users.json file in the data folder in the program and simply replace it with the desired user.

-Can someone else can edit or delete my posts, or my Topics? The answer is simply that only the administrator of the page can do it! Everyone can delete or edit only his own content. There are no moderators besides the administrator.

To test forum comment options, [click here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/13WfLQv2nWXYBNUEL3PkWwGUe3H7qkTF5Y/?Topic:1538018894_1KsFe6vgVpNFCNTQDQryrcQYySkAbFLXCV/Test+comments).

topic.body:
#Supporting US,YOUR SELF,AND THE 0NET PROJECT

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

#Get all content directly without waiting time! Get more anonymity,more quality content.

If you want support us,and support your self too to get all quality content,anonymity.And support another visitors and uploders to get more bandwidth.All of us,plus your self more secure file sharing (and anonymity).

To download all the big files on the [C&P File Share](http://127.0.0.1:43110/14YK7V93HNLJb94PFrKj4aQMxPVkrbZ3oL/) or [C&P Video sharing service](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CS9y8BCXC7iXTqDMaYnwN9br8WaRbUeJV/), drag the circle icon 0 to the left. And set the DOWNLOAD ALL OPTIONAL FILE to the size 1500MB.If you use this option you can access all max 1Byte-1500MB files directly without waiting time!

#Get more pro user, so get more content and help from your work!

If  want your self faster to proceed with your work faster.Make backlinks and descriptions,tutorils,videos,facebook post,from our services.You can link,promote your own pyrotechnic zite and services in the forum and [C&P zite index]( http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JArw6Qb7cG6NuZBqvBSprURr2aaZdCFq9/).So your promote your self too with this.And if we see your promote us,wheare try to promote back you too!

#DO NOT LOST WHAT ONCE YOUR GOT IT!

From ZeroNet-win-dist\data folder save our zites the  [C&P File Share](http://127.0.0.1:43110/14YK7V93HNLJb94PFrKj4aQMxPVkrbZ3oL/) or [C&P Video sharing service](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CS9y8BCXC7iXTqDMaYnwN9br8WaRbUeJV/),.And when your bacup it copy From ZeroNet-win-dist\data folder
this files 1CS9y8BCXC7iXTqDMaYnwN9br8WaRbUeJV and 14YK7V93HNLJb94PFrKj4aQMxPVkrbZ3oL.Than copy this 2 links in your browsers URL http://127.0.0.1:43110/14YK7V93HNLJb94PFrKj4aQMxPVkrbZ3oL/ and http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CS9y8BCXC7iXTqDMaYnwN9br8WaRbUeJV/ 
After this the zites are updated from internet.

Why its good for you? Because its a P2P platform.The are no guarantee if you can download a file, that file will be available later. And if you need it you will get it immediately,or in a short time.You will get more anonymity.Its a small community so all video and another files are not to big if you use a modern PC.

Why its good for all of us?: More anonymity,Seed,Uptime,Healt of the files,etc.

Willkommen im kostenlosen mehrsprachigen pyrotechnischen Chemieforum f√ºr Chemie und Pyrotechnik und auf dem kostenlosen Marktplatz. Kein zentraler Server und die Site werden von der Pyro-Community so betrieben wie Sie, die Leute, die das Forum besuchen! Hier k√∂nnen Sie Fragen zur Amateur- und professionellen Pyrotechnik und Chemie stellen. Sie k√∂nnen pyrotechnische Artikel an hausgemachte Produkte, Verbrauchsmaterialien, Chemikalien und das senden, was Sie gerade wollen. P2P-basiertes ZeroMail tourgh TOR ist eine sichere M√∂glichkeit, eine private Nachricht zu senden. Diese Seite ist in englischer Sprache, aber nicht an ein Land gebunden. Um dieses Programm zu verwenden, verwenden Sie den TOR ALWAYS-Modus.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

#Forumsregeln!

Drogen- und Bombenherstellung ist verboten! Sie k√∂nnen kostenlose Foren f√ºr Pyrotechnik, Sprengstoff und Chemie. Feindliche oder Community-bedrohliche und sch√§dliche Beitr√§ge und Kommentare werden gel√∂scht und von der Website entfernt. Verwenden Sie unser Forum nicht auf kultivierte Weise.

Jeder hat 195 KB Posts f√ºr seine eigene Datei data.json. Wenn dieser Betrag nicht mehr zur Verf√ºgung steht, k√∂nnen Sie das L√∂schen Ihrer alten Beitr√§ge reduzieren, die f√ºr die Community weniger n√ºtzlich sind. Der Administrator erh√∂ht automatisch das Limit f√ºr Mitglieder, die f√ºr die Community n√ºtzlich sind! F√ºr diejenigen, die Ergebnisse und gute Beitr√§ge im Forum zeigen, gilt die 195kB-Beschr√§nkung nicht f√ºr sie!

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

#Technische Informationen:

Wenn Sie Dateien von einer Datei- oder Videofreigabeseite herunterladen m√∂chten, verwenden Sie die Schaltfl√§che + SEED. Richten Sie den ZeroNet-Client so ein, dass er beim Systemstart ausgef√ºhrt wird, um die Dateien abzurufen.

Ziehen Sie das Kreissymbol 0 nach links, um alle gro√üen Dateien auf der Datei- oder Video-Sharing-Site herunterzuladen. Stellen Sie den  HELP DISTRIBUTE ADDED OPTIONAL FILES auf die Gr√∂√üe ein, die Sie zum Herunterladen einer einzelnen Datei ben√∂tigen. Beispielvideos und gr√∂√üere Dateien 1500 MB-Bilder reichen f√ºr 2 MB. Wenn Sie diese Option verwenden, k√∂nnen Sie ohne Wartezeit direkt auf alle Dateien zugreifen!

Weitere Informationen: WIE ERHALTEN SIE ALLE DATEIEN, INHALTE? UNTERST√úTZEN SIE IHR SELBST UND ALLE UNS!

- Seiten oder Eintr√§ge bearbeiten: Sie k√∂nnen Ihre Themen, Beitr√§ge oder Eintr√§ge mit der Maus direkt vor dem Eintrag bearbeiten oder l√∂schen, den Sie bearbeiten m√∂chten. Dann erscheint ein Bleistift auf dem Bleistift. Klicken Sie darauf. Ihre Kommentare k√∂nnen jederzeit bearbeitet oder gel√∂scht werden.

- Speichern Sie die Datei users.json im Datenverzeichnis des Programms! Wenn Sie dies verlieren, k√∂nnen Sie Ihr Konto nicht wiederherstellen. Wenn Sie Ihr Konto zur√ºcksetzen m√∂chten, kopieren Sie diese Datei einfach in das ZeroNet-Datenverzeichnis.

-Wie sicher ist die Seite?: Die Site im TOR ALWAYS-Modus ist absolut sicher. Nur in diesem Modus kann dich niemand √ºberwachen.

-Was kann ich auf der Website bewerben? Deshalb muss ich daf√ºr bezahlen: Sie k√∂nnen alles auf der Website frei ver√∂ffentlichen und es an alle Pyrotechnik- oder Chemieprodukte verkaufen!
-Wie kann ich meine Identit√§t √§ndern?: Speichern Sie die Datei users.json im Datenordner des Programms und ersetzen Sie sie einfach durch den gew√ºnschten Benutzer.

- Kann jemand anderes meine Beitr√§ge oder meine Themen bearbeiten oder l√∂schen? Die Antwort ist einfach, dass nur der Administrator der Seite dies tun kann! Jeder kann nur seinen eigenen Inhalt l√∂schen oder bearbeiten. Au√üer dem Administrator gibt es keine Moderatoren.

Emojis kopieren und f√ºgen Sie einfach in Ihren Beitrag ein.

#Make money anonymously with ZeroNet pyrotechnic sites and your hobby.

The most anonymous mode at the moment is XMR Monero mining. Here, your money can be collected and mined anonymously in the long term!

[Blocking of ad blockers](https://blockadblock.com/)

[XMR Mining](https://minero.cc/)
[XMR Mining 2](https://www.coinimp.com/)

You can also register here with a disposable email address.

[XMR Wallet](https://mymonero.com/)

#Save important content to ZeroNet

Join us too!

Important pyrotechnic, chemical, and explosive content is disappearing from the Internet. Don't let your favorite pages and content disappear forever.

Why is this important?

-    Because on the open web, pages are hosted on paid central servers. This is where the community feeds the content. These will eventually disappear here indefinitely.

-    The pages here are uncensored, and in TOR ALWAYS mode the operator is difficult to trace. There are no third parties.

-    It's impossible to hear exactly what content you're browsing within a page.

-    Community Growth!

Useful programs

[HTTrack Website Copier](https://www.httrack.com/page/2/)

[Notepad ++ HTML editor](https://notepad-plus-plus.org/)

This allows you to copy and edit pages that are important to you.

Setting:

-  Enable Tor Always mode in ZeroNet!

 - On the ZeroNet tab, click the ++ Create new empty, site ++ button.

- Find your page in the data directory. Then copy the files.

 - Open users.json with notepad ++. Find the title of your page here. And save the private key in the "privatekey" line. Or the whole filet in an encrypted location. IF YOU LOSE YOU LOSE ACCESS TO THE SITE!

  - Open your page. Drag and drop the ZeroNet icon in the top right corner and sign the content. Then reload the database and refresh the page!

- Publish my content to [search engines](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1JArw6Qb7cG6NuZBqvBSprURr2aaZdCFq9/)

- After more people have downloaded your page, it will remain active even after you shut down your computer.

- In the data folder users.json fil if you only use mem overwrite eg windows under ERASER. So you are indistinguishable from other visitors!

Feel free to save videos to C&P decentralized services.

#Saving web pages with ZeroNet using HTTrack Website Copier.

Fundamentals for beginners

You will find the basics of HTML 5 editing on [w3schools](https://www.w3schools.com/html/default.asp) .
If you need a software package you can download it here: [Website copier kitt ZeroNet](http://127.0.0.1:43110/14YK7V93HNLJb94PFrKj4aQMxPVkrbZ3oL/data/users/1KsFe6vgVpNFCNTQDQryrcQYySkAbFLXCV/Website%20copier%20kitt%20ZeroNet.zip) . It has Notepad ++, UTF8-Converter, httrack, irfanview image compressor.

Download [HTTrack Website Copier]( https://www.httrack.com/) and [Notepad ++]( https://notepad-plus-plus.org/downloads/). If you have a smaller page, use the firefox right-click on the page and then save the page. If you use the same style for multiple HTML files, you can use the same .css file to save space on your site.

1. HTTrack / Browser ID Set HTML Footer to (none) otherwise add a timestamp to the HTML file when and where you saved it! If not, use Notepad ++ Search / Replace here, select Regular Expression and type <! - Mirrored from. *? ->

2.  Important! In the Proxy section, configure 127.0.0.1 port 9150 and start TOR BROWSER. Otherwise you download pages directly from your own IP address.

3. Use Notepad ++ to open HTML files at once and remove scripts. To do this, use the Search / Replace option set to Advanced and type 

```
(\r\n)*<script.*?/script>(\r\n)* 
```

in the section you are looking for. This will delete all scripts. Then locate the JS files and delete them. This is important because scripts can contain harmful things!

4. If the page is not UTF-8 encoded then you need to convert it to ZeroNet otherwise you will see a messy text. You can use Notepad ++ to do this. Encode / Convert to UTF-8, or multiple files, a program that works with multiple files. In the head section, <meta charset = "UTF-8"> rewrite the other encoding to UTF-8.

5. If the images are not compressed .png, .jpg, .jpeg then compress them. Even so, they take up much less space.

Save to ZeroNet

1. Set TOR ALWAYS mode in ZeroNet otherwise you will not connect anonymously to other users.

2. Create new, empty site icon and use Notepad ++ to open the users .json file in the ZeroNet data folder. Find the title of your page here and save the key in the "privatekey" section to a text document. You can sign your page with this. Without it, your content will not be published. Once your site has been tested and works, index it for the various ZeroNetes search services. And leave your computer running until more people download your site.

Security Tips: In the data folder, overwrite users.json with eg [Eraser](https://eraser.heidi.ie/) if you do not use it. Always delete the key! Store users.json file and previously recorded key in a separated encrypted container. If you do not edit your site use an empty users.json file which does not contain any sensitive information from you.

HTML5 For ZeroNet sites (zites) ``` Title of the document Content of the document...... ``` Example The character encoding (charset) declaration is also very simple Specify a default target for all hyperlinks and forms on a page: This is important or you can not navigate correctly between pages. ``` The Link ``` If the link not works corretly with "_top" use the "_self" target attribute. Some ZeroNet Search egnies need this to correctly index your zite with the keywords. To correctly wiev your page in mobile devices.

#Birkeland-Eyde reactor for making nitric acid.
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

# Video [Nitric acid from air My setup](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CS9y8BCXC7iXTqDMaYnwN9br8WaRbUeJV/?Video=1597144015_1KsFe6vgVpNFCNTQDQryrcQYySkAbFLXCV)
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Similar vieos

[Making Nitric Acid From Air (DIY Birkeland-Eyde Reactor)](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CS9y8BCXC7iXTqDMaYnwN9br8WaRbUeJV/?Video=1597146583_1KsFe6vgVpNFCNTQDQryrcQYySkAbFLXCV)

[My Nitric acid from air setup](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CS9y8BCXC7iXTqDMaYnwN9br8WaRbUeJV/?Video=1597144181_1KsFe6vgVpNFCNTQDQryrcQYySkAbFLXCV)

Project summary aka Dmitry's FAQ:

[Q] How many kWh used per 1kg of acid?

[A] Oh, i don't know realy.

I have 1 KW on solar panels on my roof.

So the energy it takes to make acid is for free.

[Q] Did you run the bubblers in "series" to make them dissolve in the water more efficiently?

[A] Yes in series...I harvest  the first one if the color is getting brown ( Nitric acid is around 45% at this point ).This takes a few weeks. fill with new di water and place it at the end. It's a rotating system ;-)

[Q]  Is that first empty bottle intended to cool the gas before bubbling?

[A] Yes, to cool and reacting NO1 with air to get NO2. I removed it at a later stage. Seems it's not so critical.

[Q] I want to use multiple electrodes to improve efficiency.

[A] Multiple electrodes is not recommended.

The glass bottle gets really hot using 1 spark gap alone.

If you want more acid its better to cascading multiple setups.

[Q] Would copper pipes be better?

[A] Don't use copper in this setup.Glas / stainless steel / Teflon or HMPE only.Silicon tubing don't last long and gets brittle.

[Q] How strong is the output after distillation?

[A] After 1 distillation the acid was around 53 %. The text in the video is hardcoded so I can't change it.

[Q] What did you use for your high voltage generator? Neon Sign Transformer or an Flyback Transformer?

[A] I'ts a 40 Watt neon transformer.Around 6000 Volts.

Spark consumes 6000 volts at around 20mA to 30mA.

(should be 120-180 Watt, but in other comment Roger Jonker mentioned 40 Watt, then it should only consume 6-7mA at 6kV)

[Q] Name of the used bottles? Also what is white stuff on the bottom of bottles?

[A] Can't give you a link for the bubblers, got them from a used lab equipment site and are sold out. The label on the flask says: JENAERGLAS Rasotherm.Made in GDR (note: GDR=German Democratic Republic does not exist since 1990:).

White stuff on the bottom - came with the bottle. Its glass spongy / filtery material.

Dmitry edit: search ebay/amazon/other for "Gas Washing Bottle" to find similar ones. Also the "bubbler" white piece is called "frit". I guess it would be easier to just use aquarium air pump bubble stone made of quartz sand (basically made of glass!)

Remember: anything touching nitric acid must be made out of glass or teflon.

Dmitry's note: in the 1st bottle "oxidation tower" you have long and short pipes. Which one is "in" which one is "out"? Both nitric oxide and nitrogen dioxide are heavier than air so they would go down, but molar mass of oxide is only 30 g/mol while dioxide is 46 g/mol, so I would guess in order to get dioxide you'd use your long pipe as your "output" from the "oxidation tower"?  In this case I would make it all the way to the bottom to increase dioxide purity a bit :-)

Also: NO need to make Jacobs Ladder setup - it is much less efficient in terms of NO2 production. We want fry/burn air, not tickle it!  : )    Just stably burning arc produces much quicker high yield of dark brown gas.

To make a good fat stable arc (which produce no any noise btw) you should fine tune frequency of NE555 generated signal (easy enough - just replace static 10K resistor with variable resistor and play around - there will be a range of values where arc is visually "more happy" and much fatter and brighter).

The best arc is achieved when your L-C contour is in resonance mode (I'm talking about primary 5 turns L and C ) - for 2 different setups I've build the best frequencies were slightly different (one was ~36KHz, other around 42KHz).

Now, since white-burning stable fat arc is producing lots of heat (thing of it as a big candle burning) one should not use small container (as spherical one with 3 inputs shown in the video I'm commenting now: Instead it is easier to use wide mouth glass jar (often times can be found free in recycle bins), say anything more than 5-6 litters is good (10-12 litters even better, it will have bigger surface to dissipate the heat produced by arc).

I'll keep updating this comment as I go (just ordered air compressors to play with - they have no motors, so can last much longer (cheap and simple compressors with motor and plastic parts supposed to work only around 2500 hours, which is only 100 days of non-stop work before they can officially die, not good).

Here's the compressor:

3-16L Mini Vacuum Air Pump Aquarium Air Pump 2sets Start For Tube Ozone

after 10 months link to ebay item no longer works, but here's identical compressor with no motor inside:

Ozonizer 4L Min Ozone Generator Air Pump Ozone Generator Parts Aquarium Air Pump

For bubblers I also already ordered aquarium bubbler (made of quartz sand baked together (think of it as a "glass" in terms of materials)) - this should survive for long time in acid:

Aquarium Air Bubble Creator Quartz sand, 14.5 mm, 5 Pieces, Blue C6R3
